ygData.subject: Failed to get host address from ServerCache
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello, I m trying to get Heritrix 1.4.0 to crawl a web site. When I entered the seed http://www.adp.com/ I got this error: 2005-06-15T20:07:22.953Z    -2

Hello,

I'm trying to get Heritrix 1.4.0 to crawl a web site.
When I entered the seed http://www.adp.com/ I got this error:

2005-06-15T20:07:22.953Z    -2          - http://www.adp.com/ - -
no-type #002 - - -
 java.io.IOException: Failed to get host www.adp.com address from
ServerCache
	at
org.archive.crawler.fetcher.HeritrixProtocolSocket
Factory.getHostAddress(HeritrixProtocolSocketFactory.java:203)
	at
org.archive.crawler.fetcher.HeritrixProtocolSocket
Factory.createSocket(HeritrixProtocolSocketFactory.java:167)
	at
org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpConnection.open(
HttpConnection.java:669)
	at
org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpMethodDirector.e
xecuteWithRetry(HttpMethodDirector.java:359)
	at
org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpMethodDirector.e
xecuteMethod(HttpMethodDirector.java:168)
	at
org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpClient.executeMe
thod(HttpClient.java:393)
	at
org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpClient.executeMe
thod(HttpClient.java:324)
	at org.archive.crawler.fetcher.FetchHTTP.innerPro
cess(FetchHTTP.java:373)
	at org.archive.crawler.framework.Processor.proces
s(Processor.java:103)
	at
org.archive.crawler.framework.ToeThread.processCra
wlUri(ToeThread.java:272)
	at org.archive.crawler.framework.ToeThread.run(ToeThread.java:142)


Instead of http://www.adp.com/ I entered the IP address for
www.adp.com as http://170.146.198.98/ as the seed, and the crawl 
succeeded in downloading the first page at www.adp.com.

Does anyone know what I'm doing wrong here?

Thanks,

-- Tim
